text: Sacred Cenote (Well of Sacrifice) is a well known cenote at the Maya site of Chichen Itza. One can access it by a 900 foot paved corridor that leads from the Great Plaza. The Sacred Cenote was used for human sacrifices to the rain god Chaac in periods of drought. == Notes == == Other websites == * Cenotes of Chichén Itzá Category:Archaeological sites in Mexico Category:Maya civilization Category:Yucatán (state)
title: Sacred Cenote
